wiki.summary: "Accendio" is a song recorded by the South Korean girl group IVE. It was released on April 29, 2024, as the second title track from their EP "IVE SWITCH" under Starship Entertainment and distributed by Kakao M. The song explores themes of transformation and empowerment, portraying a narrative of breaking free from constraints and embracing a powerful, enigmatic persona. The lyrics depict a dramatic and intense self-reflection, where the protagonist confesses inner turmoil and asserts control over their emotions and actions. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Accendio" is a song recorded by the South Korean girl group IVE. It was released on April 29, 2024, as the second title track from their EP "IVE SWITCH" under Starship Entertainment and distributed by Kakao M. The song explores themes of transformation and empowerment, portraying a narrative of breaking free from constraints and embracing a powerful, enigmatic persona. The lyrics depict a dramatic and intense self-reflection, where the protagonist confesses inner turmoil and asserts control over their emotions and actions. With its striking imagery and evocative language, the track captures the group's dynamic range and ability to convey complex emotions. "Accendio" combines a hauntingly beautiful melody with a commanding performance, solidifying IVE's reputation for creating music that is both artistically bold and commercially successful. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
